title.native: メガトン級ムサシ

name.native: グリファース・クレド

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/AkihiroHino)

A video game designer. Started his career as a programmer in the late '80s, and later took on roles in writing, designing, directing and producing. In 1998, he founded Level-5, a Japanese video game studio, where he remains its president and CEO.

Known for titles such as Dark Cloud, Dark Chronicle, Inazuma Eleven and Professor Layton.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E8%A5%BF%E9%83%B7%E6%86%B2%E4%B8%80%E9%83%8E)

**Kenichirou Saigou** is a composer affiliated with Level-5.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/AkihiroHino)

A video game designer. Started his career as a programmer in the late '80s, and later took on roles in writing, designing, directing and producing. In 1998, he founded Level-5, a Japanese video game studio, where he remains its president and CEO.

Known for titles such as Dark Cloud, Dark Chronicle, Inazuma Eleven and Professor Layton.

Known for titles such as Dark Cloud, Dark Chronicle, Inazuma Eleven and Professor Layton.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/AkihiroHino)

A video game designer. Started his career as a programmer in the late '80s, and later took on roles in writing, designing, directing and producing. In 1998, he founded Level-5, a Japanese video game studio, where he remains its president and CEO.

Known for titles such as Dark Cloud, Dark Chronicle, Inazuma Eleven and Professor Layton.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/池田裕治)

_Note: Not to be confused with art director [Yuuji Ikeda](https://anilist.co/staff/101824/)_

[Twitter](https://x.com/choongchengloon) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/artofccl/) | [Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/choongchengloon.bsky.social) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/16922291)

Choong Cheng Loon is a Malaysian animator who formerly worked for OLM Asia as an In-Between Animator and is now working with Chuckle Mouse Studio as a Key Animator.
